actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1587.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 13750 to implement the International Sugar Agreement between the United States and foreign countries; to protect the welfare of consumers of sugar and those engaged in the domestic sugar-producing industry; to promote the export trade of the United States; and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 13750 (International Sugar Agreement).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 13750 to implement the International Sugar Agreement between the United States and foreign countries; to protect the welfare of consumers of sugar and those engaged in the domestic sugar-producing industry; to promote the export trade of the United States; and for other purposes.
